description:
In this course you'll learn about the fundamental building blocks for eCommerce SEO and learn techniques that you can apply immediately to your eCommerce website.

Optimizing e-commerce websites for SEO (Search Engine Optimization) is much harder than it is for blogs or other types of websites. Companies that sell products and services online have unique set of challenges and learning SEO can be an intimidating process.

There’s an incredible amount of information across the web and even more conflicting opinions from so-called "experts." You could spend months trying to sort everything out.

Or you could invest 2 hours in this course and come away with a solid foundation of how SEO really works. This course focuses on the core need-to-know concepts to give you a working knowledge of eCommerce SEO as quickly as possible.

By the end of this course you'll know how to better optimize your eCommerce site and SEO best practices that will improve your site rankings.

After completing this eCommerce SEO course, if you absorb the main SEO concepts, you’ll have a better understanding of SEO than 90% of eCommerce store owners.
title: Ecommerce SEO: Ultimate Guide for Ranking Ecommerce Websites
